title: BRIEF-Aboitiz Power Confirms Unit Has Plans Of Constructing Run-Of-River Hydropower Project
text:
BRIEF-Aboitiz Power Confirms Unit Has Plans Of Constructing Run-Of-River Hydropower Project

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:10)

BRIEF-Aboitiz Power Confirms Unit Has Plans Of Constructing Run-Of-River Hydropower Project Oct 7 (Reuters) - Aboitiz Power Corp :

* CONFIRM THAT UNIT HEDCOR, INC. HAS PLANS OF CONSTRUCTING

RUN-OF-RIVER HYDROPOWER PROJECT IN SABLAN, BENGUET IN 2020



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX292lg1

Further company coverage: AP.PS





BRIEF-Aboitiz Power Confirms Unit Has Plans Of Constructing Run-Of-River Hydropower Project
